title: The ABC of unions
creator_credit: Barry Pierce and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: A group of high school students, reacting against their harsh music master, devise an analogous story about why there are trade unions. They learn all about arbitration, bargaining and compromise. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
